titleStmt.title: Strange news from Barkshire of an apparition of several ships and men in the air, which seemed to the beholders to be fighting they were seen by the carrier of Cirencester and his company, as they were upon the road coming for London, near Abbington, on Tuesday the 26th of August, 1679 : of the truth of which you may be fully satisfied at the Sarazens Head Inn in Carter-Lane, London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
